resource.chars:
Telephone 5953 Westminster 
174, BUCKINGHAM PALACE ROAD, S.W.
21.9.08

Dear Sir Archibald 
Thank you for your very kind and courteous 
reply to my letter and for the congratulations and 
good wishes you send on my marriage
I’m sure you’ll believe me when I say that I’m 
most anxious to avoid a public protest or reply 
to Dr. Shaws remarks and shall much prefer that 
the matter be adjusted amicably in the 
second meteorological volume - at the same time 
I must assure you that the annoyance and suspicion I 
expressed to you are not the result of oversensitiveness 
but have a very reasonable foundation 
I could put it all on paper but I should much 
prefer, before I attempt that, to see you and explain
